example_sentence_italian: I bar della città sono famosi.

example_sentence_english: The quality of the bars varies.

example_sentence_italian: Preferisco andare ai bar del centro.
example_sentence_english: I prefer going to the bars downtown.
I get the newspaper from the bar.

example_sentence_italian: Prendiamo cornetti dai bar vicino alla piazza.
example_sentence_english: We get croissants from the bars near the square.

example_sentence_italian: Ci sono molte persone nel bar.
example_sentence_english: There are many people in the bar.

example_sentence_italian: Ho appoggiato il cellulare sul bar.
example_sentence_english: I put my phone on the bar.

example_sentence_italian: Sui bar della via sono attaccati manifesti.
example_sentence_english: Posters are attached to the bars on the street.

example_sentence_italian: Col bar chiuso, la strada è tranquilla.
example_sentence_english: With the bar closed, the street is quiet.

notes: contraction of con + i; invariable plural
example_sentence_italian: Coi bar chiusi, la piazza è deserta.
example_sentence_english: With the bars closed, the square is deserted.
